Name: Children Ruin Everything
Title: Bedtime
Desc: When James finds an old game console, he and Astrid attempt to find free time to play.
LongDescription: When James finds an old game console, he and Astrid attempt to find free time to play; but a bedtime routine threatens to eat up all the time between when the kids are supposed to be in bed and when Astrid and James have to go to bed themselves.
